news_header: TikTok has gone offline in the US due to a new law banning the platform.
news_text: TikTok has ceased operations in the US just before a law banning the platform was set to take effect. A message on the app informed users that the ban was enacted, stating that TikTok cannot be used for now. President Trump has indicated he may work on a solution to reinstate TikTok after taking office. The app has also been removed from US app stores, and TikTok's CEO has appealed to Trump for assistance. Content creators expressed concerns over the impact of the ban on their income and educational content.
